periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 4am and 5am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 65, with temperatures rising to around 70 overnight. South wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 1pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 1pm and 4pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 41, with temperatures rising to around 43 overnight. North northwest wind around 6 mph.
